lead_paragraph: Once he rounded the bases a second time, propelled by a roaring crowd at Progressive Field, Roberto Perez began to understand what he had done.

headline.print_headline: Twice as Nice: Indians' Perez Hits 2 Homers in Series Opener
headline.main: Twice as Nice: Indians' Perez Hits 2 Homers in Series Opener
